item.title: Calls
item.description: Not only can SeaChat handle text-based conversations, but it can also handle phone calls. The SeaChat allows you to create a voice-based conversational agent to pick up all the inbound calls or to call out to customers. This voice agent can handle inbound calls, answer customer queries, and provide customer support. The SeaChat voice agent can also transfer calls to live agents when needed, providing a seamless experience for your customers.
